channel.title: CVE Feed for chicken -- chicken
channel.description: The latest CVEs for chicken -- chicken

item.title: CVE-2012-6122|2024-08-06T21:28:39.421Z -- chicken -- chicken
item.description: Buffer overflow in the thread scheduler in Chicken before 4.8.0.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) by opening a file descriptor with a large integer value.

item.title: CVE-2013-2024|2024-08-06T15:20:37.412Z -- chicken -- chicken
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in the "qs" procedure from the "utils" module in Chicken before 4.9.0.

item.title: CVE-2012-6125|2024-08-06T21:28:39.307Z -- chicken -- chicken
item.description: Chicken before 4.8.0 is susceptible to algorithmic complexity attacks related to hash table collisions.

item.title: CVE-2012-6123|2024-08-06T21:28:39.385Z -- chicken -- chicken
item.description: Chicken before 4.8.0 does not properly handle NUL bytes in certain strings, which allows an attacker to conduct "poisoned NUL byte attack."

item.title: CVE-2013-2075|2024-08-06T15:27:40.560Z -- chicken -- chicken
item.description: Multiple buffer overflows in the (1) R5RS char-ready, (2) tcp-accept-ready, and (3) file-select procedures in Chicken through 4.8.0.3 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) by opening a file descriptor with a large integer value. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2012-6122.

item.title: CVE-2012-6124|2024-08-06T21:28:39.540Z -- chicken -- chicken
item.description: A casting error in Chicken before 4.8.0 on 64-bit platform caused the random number generator to return a constant value. NOTE: the vendor states "This function wasn't used for security purposes (and is advertised as being unsuitable)."
